snippet: An independent team named by Gov. Jan Brewer to review the state’s troubled child welfare agency called on Friday for a top-to-bottom overhaul of the department to focus it purely on child safety.
abstract: Independent team named by Arizona Gov Jan Brewer to review the state’s troubled child welfare agency calls for top-to-bottom overhaul of the department to focus it purely on child safety; outlines steps needed to address years-long problems at Child Protective Services.
lead_paragraph: An independent team named by Gov. Jan Brewer to review the state’s troubled child welfare agency called on Friday for a top-to-bottom overhaul of the department to focus it purely on child safety.

headline.main: Arizona: Panel Outlines Overhaul for Child Welfare Services
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Panel Outlines Overhaul for Child Welfare Services
